title: Decrease in FPS
body: Before the new patch update my FPS was perfectly fine usually around 60-70 fps, now ever since the new update I don't even hit 20! It hovers around 14-17 fps and I can't even play a normal game anymore without it constantly freezing. Please help!

replies.body: You might need to double check for a driver update after that latest patch. Sometimes those game files can change so much that old drivers don't really work very well anymore. Make sure to go through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), but definitely hit me back up if that's not helping!
